Description: Role:§  Preparation of checklist/requirements for various immigration statuses (work Permit/Visas) across the world.§  Review of information and documents submitted for work permits and secure necessary clarifications from assignees.§  Preparation of work permit applications for various countries worldwide for multiple clients.§  Update the necessary details on online application and client tools as per Standard Operating Procedures.§  Monitor and follow-up on the status of applications with network firms, partners and third-party vendors till the closure of application processing.§  Coordinate with client SPOCs and assignees on case to case basis for effective management of the processes.§  Coordinate with Consular offices, immigration departments, labour department and other government bodies for securing of appropriate immigration status to assignees.§  Adhere to the standard procedures laid down by the organization and its clients while delivering the objectives.Job Details
